IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO EDUCATE, EMPOWER AND EQUIP STUDENTS FOR LIFELONG CAREERS IN INDUSTRY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO FULFILL THE DEMAND FOR HIGHLY SKILLED PROFESSIONALS AS A NATIONALLY RECOGNIZED INSTITUTION KNOWN FOR OUR UNIQUE AND RELEVANT CAREER TRAINING.
IRS990.Desc: PERRY TECHNICAL INSTITUTE SERVES THE NEEDS OF A VARIETY OF INDUSTRIES BY EQUIPPING STUDENTS WITH STRONG TECHNICAL SKILLS AND POSITIVE WORK HABITS. FACULTY MEMBERS WITH EXTENSIVE EXPERIENCE IN INDUSTRY PROVIDE SPECIALIZED CLASSROOM INSTRUCTION AND HANDS-ON LAB EXPERIENCES. OVER 675 STUDENTS ARE ENROLLED IN PERRY'S 14 TRAINING PROGRAMS. PTI'S RETENTION RATE IS 88% AND THE JOB PLACEMENT RATE IS 91%. PERRY COMPLETED THE REACCREDIDATION PROCESS, RESULTING IN FULL ACCREDIDATION WITH NO FINDINGS.

BooksInCareOfDetail.PersonNm: CATHY STERBENZ VP OF FINANCE AND A

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ENDOWMENT FUNDS RAISE FUNDS FOR SCHOLARSHIPS TO PERRY TECHNICAL INSTITUTE STUDENTS AND TO ASSURE THE LONG TERM STABILITY AND EXISTENCE OF PERRY TECHNICAL INSTITUTE.

PERRY TECHINCAL INSTITUTE IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAXES UNDER THE PROVISIONS OF SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE EXCEPT TO THE EXTENT OF UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TAX UNDER SECTIONS 511 THROUGH 515. IN ACCORDANCE WITH REQUIREMENTS RELATED TO ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS, THE INSTITUTE HAD NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS OF JUNE 30, 2023 AND 2022. THE INSTITUTE FILES INCOME TAX RETURNS IN THE U.S. FEDERAL JURISDICTIONS. IN ADDITION, THE INSTITUTE HAS NO MATERIAL UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME SUBJECT TO TAX AT JUNE 30, 2023 AND 2022.
ALL STUDENT SOLICITATION CONTAINS THE NON-DISCRIMINATORY POLICY OF THE INSTITUTE.
ORGANIZATION RECEIVES FEDERAL STUDENT FINANCIAL AID FOR THE DIRECT BENEFIT OF QUALIFIED STUDENTS.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO PROVIDE FUNDS FOR PROGRAM MANAGEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FUNDS ARE PROVIDED TO THE RELATED FOUNDATION AND THEREFORE ALL FUNDS ARE USED IN THE US.
ON AN ANNUAL BASIS THE PRESIDENT IS AWARDED A BONUS. THE TRUSTEES OF THE ORGANIZATION DETERMINE THE BONUS FOR THE PRESIDENT BASED ON MERIT AND PERFORMANCE.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: FOR CONSTRUCTION OF AN EDUCATIONAL FACILITY

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, SCHEDULE K, PART II, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE AMOUNT LISTED ON PART II, LINE 3, TOTAL PROCEEDS OF ISSUE IS DIFFERENT FROM PART I, COLUMN E, ISSUE PRICE DUE TO $772,887 OF PRINCIPAL PAYMENTS MADE ON THE BOND.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE FORM 990 AND THE SCHEDULE B WAS PROVIDED TO THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING BODY FOR REVIEW AT A TRUSTEE MEETING BEFORE THE FORM WAS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS REVIEWED AND UPDATED ANNUALLY. MANAGEMENT PROVIDES THE POLICY TO EMPLOYEES TO COMMUNICATE ITS IMPORTANCE AND ADDRESS ANY ISSUES THAT MAY ARISE. THE TRUSTEES DISCLOSE CONFLICTS (IF ANY) AND CONFLICTS ARE DOCUMENTED IN MEETING MINUTES. IF AN ISSUE IS NOTED, THAT PERSON IS EXCUSED FROM CONVERSATIONS AND DECISIONS THAT MAY BE IMPACTED BY THE CONFLICT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION USES THE WASHINGTON STATE AND FEDERAL WAGE DATABASES, AS WELL AS THE PUBLIC INFORMATION ON WAGES FROM STATE COLLEGES, TO DETERMINE APPROPRIATE WAGE LEVELS FOR ALL EMPLOYEES EXCEPT THE PRESIDENT. THE TRUSTEES OF THE ORGANIZATION MEET ANNUALLY TO REVIEW AND DETERMINE THE COMPENSATION FOR THE PRESIDENT AND DOCUMENT IN MEETING MINUTES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT MAKE ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: TO RAISE FUNDS TO GIVE SCHOLARSHIPS TO PERRY TECHNICAL INSTITUTE

DirectControllingEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: JM PERRY INSTITUTE OF TRADES INDUSTRIES

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: PART II, IDENTIFICATION OF RELATED TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATIONS
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NAME OF RELATED ORGANIZATION: PERRY TECHNICAL FOUNDATION PRIMARY ACTIVITY: TO RAISE FUNDS TO GIVE SCHOLARSHIPS TO PERRY TECHNICAL INSTITUTE STUDENTS DIRECT CONTROLLING ENTITY: J.M. PERRY INSTITUTE OF TRADES INDUSTRIES AND AGRICULTURE
